[[Part 2|Break Room]]

passages.name: Warehouse
passages.text:
<>
Shipping and Receiving
The store's receiving bay has been transformed into a testing area, with a maze of white lines painted on the concrete floor. Hoodie-wearing Sunrise employees guide scruffy-looking Early Adopters with deadened eyes along endless, circuitous paths using controllers. The fringes of the room are dark, and in one corner, Sunrise has built up a small scaffold manned by a couple older employees who periodically radio down to the hoodie types using small handsets. It's hot here. There's no air conditioning, so the two [[garage doors|Warehouse Garage Doors]] have been opened a couple feet. [[Swinging doors|Bustling Hallway]] lead back to a busy hallway. <><><>

passages.name: Hair Treatments Bounce
passages.text: \nIt's a wasteland of mattresses and laminate furniture out there, and all the exits [[remain closely guarded.|Hair Treatments]]\n

passages.name: Heather Followup 3.1
passages.text: "In the stock room somewhere," she says. "The shoe that guy picked is so far out of style I wouldn't know where to begin." [["It wouldn't be kept with the other shoes?"|Heather Followup 3.2]] [["OK."|Front Counter Room 2]]

links.text: "It wouldn't be kept with the other shoes?"

passages.name: Heather Followup 3.2
passages.text: "Odds are it's gotten pushed to the side." [["OK."|Front Counter Room 2]]

passages.name: Stock Room Jumble 2 Search Intro
passages.text: You find the correct box (Style: "Luna," Size: 9D, Color: Tidal) and open it, but only the right shoe is inside, sprinkled with shreds of tissue paper. There's a hole in the side of the box. [[Search for another "Luna" box, Size: 9D, Color: Tidal.|Stock Room Jumble 2 Search Intro 2]]

links.text: Search for another "Luna" box, Size: 9D, Color: Tidal.

passages.name: Heather Followup 1.4
passages.text: "He hangs out in the Lower Level Sales Office all the time and never takes a vacation or sick day." [["I wonder why."|Heather Followup 1.5]]

passages.name: Heather Followup 1.5
passages.text: \n"He's a workaholic," she says, and [[you nod.|Front Counter Room 2]]\n

passages.name: Heather Followup 1.2
passages.text: "He discovered the New Shoe manufacturer and negotiated a partnership." [[You listen as she continues.|Heather Followup 1.3]]

passages.name: Heather Followup 1.3
passages.text: "Exactly how he worked out an exclusive deal, nobody knows," she says. "To the Board of Directors, he's a minor deity." [[You glance at the stock room.|Heather Followup 1.4]]

links.text: You glance at the stock room.

passages.name: Heather Followup 1.1
passages.text: <> "You mean Ken?" she says softly. [["I think so."|Heather Followup 1.2]]

passages.name: Storage Sublevel
passages.text:
<>
Storage Sublevel
Stairs lead down to a large basement filled with shipping crates and refuse. In the gloom above hangs an old elliptical track that bundles together costumes and other curiosities by theme. You can just reach the [[dangling control box.|Storage Sublevel Control Box]] <> A wooden [[shepherd's crook|Costume Crook]] lies on the floor, and a flickering lightbulb illuminates the [[door|Waiting Room]] at the top of the stairs. <> <> A flickering lightbulb illuminates the [[door|Waiting Room]] at the top of the stairs. <> A flickering lightbulb illuminates the [[door|Drop Crook]] at the top of the stairs. <> <> <><><>

passages.name: Sporting Goods Associate
passages.text: <>Sales Associate        His name tag says "Corey Big." "Can I help you with something, sir?" [["Uh, no."|Sporting Goods]] [["Do you have shotguns?"|Sporting Goods Question]] <><><>

passages.name: Storage Sublevel Control Box
passages.text: <>Control Box        Softly glowing buttons are labeled: [[Lacy Triceratops|Costume Dinosaur]] [[Hot Pickin' Lawyer|Costume Lawyer]] [[The Marquis of the Tomb|Costume Marquis]] [[Weepy Clown|Costume Clown]] [[Adolescent Wolf|Costume Delinquent]] [[Le Chef du Cereal|Costume Chef]] <>[[The Shepherd from Beyond|Costume Crook Fall]]<>[[The Shepherd from Beyond|Costume Shepherd]]<> [[Desert Princess|Costume Princess]] [[Special Agent Squid|Costume Cuttlefish]] [[Back|Storage Sublevel]] <><><>

passages.name: Employee I.D.
passages.text: <>   The machine beeps and displays an instruction to  [[report to the Lower Level|9:00]]     <> <>   Your I.D. and time card. Has your half-smiling, blue-eyed face on it. You look tired.    <>   Probably not the best use of your I.D.    <> <>

passages.name: Elevator Ride
passages.text: \nThe elevator shoots up at nauseating speed, dumps you out onto a high shelf in the stock room, and returns to whatever sub-sub-sub-basement it came from. You crawl to the platform's edge and climb down [[to the floor.|Stock Room Final]]\n

passages.name: 9:00 Following First Directions
passages.text:
<>
Sort of Lost
You somehow end up in Men's Undershirts and decide to wander back. [[Of course. It really is left at the nurse's station, right at the decrepit highboys, straight past the entrance to the mall, and down a floor on the elevator.|9:00 Following Second Directions]] <><><>

links.text: Of course. It really is left at the nurse's station, right at the decrepit highboys, straight past the entrance to the mall, and down a floor on the elevator.

passages.name: Conference Room Look at Handler
passages.text:
<>
There's something welcoming about him, something familiar. He has soft brown eyes and night black hair that tapers back into a duck tail. <> [[Look at the conference table.|Conference Room Look at Table]] [[Turn around.|Conference Room Turn Around]] <> Your handler twists a knob, and your legs hobble you over [[to a stool.|Conference Room Stool]] <>

passages.name: Bonnets Bounce
passages.text: \nIt's a wasteland of mattresses and laminate furniture out there, and all the exits [[remain closely guarded.|Bonnets and Brines]]\n

passages.name: Bonnets Question
passages.text: <>He looks closely at your handbag. "Would you mind removing what's inside of your bag?" he says. You pull out the jars one by one and place them on the counter. "Were you going to pay for those?" the associate says. [["I have no money."|Police]]<><>He glances at your handbag. "Over this way, past the juniors' bonnets," he says. "If you get to a wall of lightbulbs, you went too far." [["Thanks."|Bonnets and Brines]]<><>He seems startled by your voice. "Back around here," he says, pointing. "Hang a left at the juniors' bonnets." [["Thanks."|Bonnets and Brines]]<>

passages.name: Training Convo 2.1
passages.text: <> "About three years now, but it seems like longer." [["Because you're bored?"|Training Convo 2.2]] [["Why is that?"|Training Convo 2.3]]

passages.name: Training Convo 2.3
passages.text: "Customer activity on the Lower Level is pretty sporadic, and what we do get is fifty percent wackos." <><>You notice a man browsing in the Beach Sandals section.<><>Heather looks over her shoulder at a customer who's muttering to himself. It's the guy looking at Beach Sandals.<><>The man in the Beach Sandals section has needed the help of a sales associate for quite some time.<> [["We should give this guy a hand."|Beach Sandals]] <>[["This stuff is easy."|Training Convo 1.1]] [["How is Vandar, as a boss?"|Training Convo 3.1]] <>[["What does the Lower Level Sales Manager do?"|Training Convo 3.3]]<><><>[["This stuff is easy."|Training Convo 1.1]] <>[["What does the Lower Level Sales Manager do?"|Training Convo 3.3]]<><><>[["How is Vandar, as a boss?"|Training Convo 3.1]] <>[["What does the Lower Level Sales Manager do?"|Training Convo 3.3]]<><><><>[["What does the Lower Level Sales Manager do?"|Training Convo 3.3]]<><>

links.text: "We should give this guy a hand."
"What does the Lower Level Sales Manager do?"

passages.name: Training Convo 2.2
passages.text: "It's boring but only because there's no one normal to talk to," she says. "I'm a structural engineer by training." [["Really?"|Training Convo 2.2.5]] [["Where does all the random bric-a-brac come from?"|Training Convo 2.4]]

links.text: "Where does all the random bric-a-brac come from?"

passages.name: Training Convo 2.4
passages.text: "It's not even clearance. It's something beyond clearance." <><>You notice a man browsing in the Beach Sandals section.<><>Heather looks over her shoulder at a customer who's muttering to himself. It's the guy looking at Beach Sandals.<><>The guy in the Beach Sandals section has needed the help of a sales associate for quite some time.<> [["We should give that guy a hand."|Beach Sandals]] <>[["This stuff is easy."|Training Convo 1.1]] [["How is Vandar, as a boss?"|Training Convo 3.1]] <>[["What does the Lower Level Sales Manager do?"|Training Convo 3.3]]<><><>[["This stuff is easy."|Training Convo 1.1]] <>[["What does the Lower Level Sales Manager do?"|Training Convo 3.3]]<><><>[["How is Vandar, as a boss?"|Training Convo 3.1]] <>[["What does the Lower Level Sales Manager do?"|Training Convo 3.3]]<><><><>[["What does the Lower Level Sales Manager do?"|Training Convo 3.3]]<><>

links.text: "We should give that guy a hand."
"What does the Lower Level Sales Manager do?"

passages.name: Start
passages.text:
Aquanet
   Click [§] for inventory.    [[Part 1|Time Clock 1]]   /   [[Part 2|Part Two]]   /   [[Part 3|Part Three]]

passages.name: Clothing Wandering Follow
passages.text: The man and his dog lead you to the department's safe haven, a clearing dominated by Clothing's gender-segregated dressing rooms, each one decorated and equipped to meet a single man or woman's living needs. Beside the outpost is a tangle of space heaters surrounded by benches and chairs, and the entire area is littered with the wrappers of snack brands carried by Braxxton's. A group of [[Clothing Dept. employees|Clothing Meeting]] comes scrabbling out, each of them dressed as absurdly as the dog guy.

passages.name: Admin Hallway
passages.text: In the hallway, a wiry man in a red Sunrise hooded sweatshirt runs up behind you and grabs your elbow. He looks deep in your eyes. "How did you get out here?" he says. In his left hand, he's holding a long controller with a little spin wheel and more buttons than a TV remote. [[Shrug.|Admin Hallway 2]]

passages.name: Take Device
passages.text:
<>
\nYou grab it. [[It's heavy.|Front Counter Final]]\n

passages.name: script
Stock Room Intro
passages.text:
<>
Stock Room
You pass through the doorway, and everywhere there are shoeboxes. One of your coworkers is squatting next to a [[blonde-headed man|Stock Room Vandar]] in a tailored suit who appears to have been knocked to the ground with a [[ceramic frog,|Stock Room Frog]] which lies nearby. A doorway leads back to the [[front counter.|Front Counter]] <><><>

passages.name: Blessed Office Seated 1
passages.text: You sink into the chair. "Help me, or I'll erase everything," she says, taking a small controller out of the desk. "Even your own name. You won't know [[your family from Adam."|Blessed Office Seated 2]]

passages.name: Blessed Office Seated 3
passages.text: "Hello," she says and listens for a moment. "Again? You're telling me again? We still have a lot of work to do to improve their shielding. Someone with the right capabilities could learn a lot from them." She hangs up the phone and yells, "Security?" No answer. She sticks the controller in her pocket and [[steps outside.|Blessed Office 3]]

passages.name: Blessed Office Seated 2
passages.text: She looks at the controller, and her eyes go big. "Your shoes are deactivated," she says. "How did you do that?" She quickly reactivates them, and a creepy-crawly feeling runs up your left leg. You feel the same old pressure closing in on your mind. [[The phone rings.|Blessed Office Seated 3]]

passages.name: Stock Room Boxes 2
passages.text: <>Shelves of Shoes        Many shoes positioned with their ends facing you. Each has a label crammed with product codes and abbreviations for different styles. [[Search for beach sandals.|Stock Room Boxes 2 Search]] [[Back|Stock Room 2]] <><><>

passages.name: Yipp 10
passages.text: \nSomething strikes the back of your head. It feels like the ceiling just fell on you, and all goes black. [[Again.|Black Again]]\n

passages.name: Saline Grab
passages.text: \nIt looks spoiled. [[You put it back.|Brine Supplies]]\n

passages.name: Heather Convo 3
passages.text: "You'll have to figure this place out on your own." [["Bye."|Front Counter Room]] [["Vandar said you would show me how to be a Sales Associate."|Heather Convo 2]]

links.text: "Vandar said you would show me how to be a Sales Associate."

passages.name: Heather Convo 2
passages.text: \n"I bet," she says. [["This way."|Training Mission]]\n

passages.name: Stock Room Jumble 2 Search Wait
passages.text: <>Amorphous Black Shape Carrying a Shoe        The creature (rodent?) is crouching (?) a short distance from you, waiting. From what you can see, its underside is flat like a slug's. [[Freeze.|Stock Room Jumble 2 Search Wait Exit]] [[Grab the shoe.|Stock Room Jumble 2 Search Wait Exit Grab]] <><><>

destination.name: Stock Room Jumble 2 Search Wait Exit
Stock Room Jumble 2 Search Wait Exit Grab

passages.name: Use Left Shoe 2.5
passages.text: \nYou believe you're [[going to faint.|Use Left Shoe 3]]\n

passages.name: Shopper Help
passages.text: "I had help until the bastard ran off into the clothing racks," she says and looks at you cagey. [["Sorry."|Shopper Convo]]

passages.name: Makeover Old Man
passages.text:
<>
"Old man," they say and show you to a changing room. When you're done, they come and kneel at your feet with the controller, arguing over what to activate and for how long. Finally, they instruct you to [[close your eyes.|Makeover Process]]

passages.name: Large Bin
passages.text: <>Large Bin        <> You take a slight detour and peek inside. There's a chrome-plated foot measuring device left inside. [[Take it.|Take Device]] <> The bin is empty. <> [[Back|Front Counter Final]] <><><>

passages.name: YippTwo 5
passages.text: "Hang onto those shoes and bring the controller with you. This is for a higher cause." [[She hangs up.|Waiting Room]]

passages.name: YippTwo 4
passages.text: "A coaster with Y on the back. Once you find one, hold it near your shoes and push the small yellow button for anywhere from 5 to 555 seconds, depending on the model. Call me when you're somewhere safe." [["I guess I have no choice."|YippTwo 5]]

passages.name: YippTwo 1
passages.text: <> She picks up but doesn't say anything. [["Hello?"|YippTwo 2]] <> The phone rings, but [[there's no answer.|Waiting Room Phone Book]] <>

passages.name: YippTwo 3
passages.text:
<>
She sighs. "So they have you. This is troubling news. You need to find an Upsilon Controller at once. It should allow you to deactivate your shoes and slip out a side door. At least you'll be able to run again." [["What does an Upsilon Controller look like?"|YippTwo 4]]

links.text: "What does an Upsilon Controller look like?"

passages.name: YippTwo 2
passages.text: "Michael? Is this a cell phone? What's your situation?" [["Yes, this is a cell phone. I'm wandering around the Sunrise-controlled area of Braxxton's in a pair of New Shoes."|YippTwo 3]]

links.text: "Yes, this is a cell phone. I'm wandering around the Sunrise-controlled area of Braxxton's in a pair of New Shoes."

passages.name: Use Crook
passages.text:
<>
\nIt's dusty and a little big for you, but you [[slip it on.|Storage Sublevel]]\n

passages.name: Stock Room Jumble 2 Search Intro 5
passages.text: <> It runs away and around to the back of the pile, traveling in a counterclockwise direction. From what you could see, a small, dark shape was carrying the shoe as if it were strapped to its back. [[You stagger slightly.|Stock Room Jumble 2 Search]]

passages.name: Stock Room Jumble 2 Search Intro 2
passages.text: No luck. [[Hmm. Search for the left shoe in the pile.|Stock Room Jumble 2 Search Intro 3]]

links.text: Hmm. Search for the left shoe in the pile.

passages.name: Stock Room Jumble 2 Search Intro 3
passages.text: You find sandals decorated with gold charms and rhinestones but nothing like the blue butterfly style. [["Well, come on."|Stock Room Jumble 2 Search Intro 4]]

passages.name: Yipp 3.1
passages.text: "That's no mere footwear," she says. "It connects directly to the mind." [["So what, if it's used for fashion purposes?"|Yipp 4]]

links.text: "So what, if it's used for fashion purposes?"

passages.name: Clothing Wandering Yes
passages.text: You realize you're shaking. "Running from a man with a gun?" the guy says. "Stick close. You won't find your way on your own, and neither will he." [[Follow along.|Clothing Wandering Follow]]

passages.name: Friday Outro 2
passages.text: \nYou keep the shoebox pile in the corner of your eye, but the black thing never returns. Neither does Vandar, which seems to worry Heather. After about ninety minutes of milling about, trying to look busy, you take your [[lunch break.|Part Two]]\n

passages.name: Part Three
passages.text:
<<silently>>
--
<<set $object="null">>
<<set $havecontroller2="yes">>
<<set $blessedroom="no">>
<<set $havedevice="no">>
<<set $makeover="null">>
<<set $theftticker=0>>
<<set $lootuse="null">>
<<set $haveweight="no">>
<<set $havelure="no">>
<<set $havepliers="no">>
<<set $havehairpins="no">>
<<set $havecurlingiron="no">>
<<set $havepick="no">>
<<set $havevinegar="no">>
<<set $havepickling="no">>
<<set $havemarinade="no">>
--
<<set $haveid="yes">>
<<set $havenametag="no">>
<<set $haveshoehorn="no">>
<<set $havebedazzled="no">>
<<set $havecrook="no">>
<<set $havecoat="yes">>
<<set $havenothing="no">>
<<set $havefruit="no">>
<<set $havecontroller="no">>
--
<<endsilently>><html><style>#passages {background-color:#000000; width:700px; font:56px arial; margin-top:32px;} .passage {text-align:center;} a:link{color:#FFFFFF !important; text-decoration:none !important;} a:visited{color:#FFFFFF !important; text-decoration:none !important;} a:hover {color:#AAAAAA !important; text-decoration:none !important;}</style></html>
[[Part 3|Outside]]

passages.name: Friday Outro 1
passages.text: \nHeather agrees. There's much to discuss, including where to locate [[all of the popular brands|Friday Outro 2]] in the stock room, labels like Victoria Niemann, Trail-Scuffers, and New Elegance.

passages.name: Costume Princess
passages.text: <>Desert Princess Costume        A strapless dress makes a sound like dry leaves as it heaves into view. [[Back|Storage Sublevel Control Box]] <><><><>

passages.name: Vandar Convo 9
passages.text: "But enough of my chattering," he says. "Go find those containers, they're bound to ..." [["I saw them ..."|Vandar Convo 10]]

passages.name: Bustling Hallway
passages.text:
<><>
Busy Hallway
The floor is aquamarine and dirtied by heavy traffic. At one end, a pair of weighty [[swinging doors|Warehouse]] leads into a much larger space, and at the opposite end is a [[waiting room.|Waiting Room]] Directly across from the [[little examination room|Exam Room]] is the food contractor's [[makeshift cafeteria.|Cafeteria]] <> <><><><>

passages.name: Vandar Convo 2
passages.text: <> "I need you to retrieve something for me," he says and gestures for you to draw closer. "Something very, very heavy. A pile of leftover shoeboxes from our latest product, the New Shoe." [["Why are they so heavy?"|Vandar Convo 3]] [["What's the New Shoe?"|Vandar Convo 4]]

passages.name: Hospital 2
passages.text:
<html><style>#passages{background-color:#000000;margin-left:20%;}</style></html>
She thanks you. It comes out awkwardly, but she means it. 

Maryann confronted Blessed over the phone, and now Sunrise is pulling out of Red River to regroup elsewhere, perhaps to retool the New Shoe, or abandon it completely. Maryann says her sister doesn't deal well with failure.

In the meantime, a group of former Sunrise employees is reaching out to government officials, researchers, and business leaders and showing them the specimens you procured. The hardest part is getting people to believe the truth.

[["I know."|Hospital 2.5]]

passages.name: Hospital 3
passages.text: <html><style>#passages{background-color:#000000;margin-left:20%;}</style></html>\nAfter Maryann leaves, you sit down in the day room and pick up a book. It's one of the novels you asked your parents to bring you from home, a pulpy old paperback on the subject of mind control. Innocent victims are enslaved by a virus they contract through a popular breakfast cereal called Cute 'n' Crunchy Kitties, and in a matter of weeks, the whole population [[has been deluded into following a moon cult.|Hospital 4]]\n

links.text: has been deluded into following a moon cult.

passages.name: Hospital 4
passages.text:
<html><style>#passages{background-color:#000000;margin-left:20%;}</style></html>
You wonder how much time you and the rest of humanity really have, how many other Blessed Yipp's are out there, buried under the earth, making magic out of technology. Maryann said that unless Blessed goes completely broke, she'll keep trying with something or other.

[[Maybe it's always been this way.|Hospital 5]]

links.text: Maybe it's always been this way.

passages.name: Vandar Convo 6
passages.text: He takes another breath. "Ice, gravel, broken glass, the New Shoe transforms on the fly, and we're going to be selling it exclusively for the first 18 months." [["That's something."|Vandar Convo 9]]

passages.name: Vandar Convo 5
passages.text: "I don't know the whole story," he says. "Suffice it to say the shoeboxes contain as many electronics as the shoes themselves." [["OK."|Vandar Convo 6]]

passages.name: Vandar Convo 4
passages.text: "It'll change everything," he says and takes a deep breath. "In short, neurochemical sensors embedded in the shoes' soles will transmit stress and mood data to a central processor which will also receive attire schematics from backward-facing cameras in the toes, allowing the exterior to auto-transform the shoe for the aesthetic and occupational challenges ahead, all without prompting. It's basically an electronic chameleon." [["That sounds terrific."|Vandar Convo 6]] [["But why are the containers so heavy?"|Vandar Convo 5]]

links.text: "But why are the containers so heavy?"

passages.name: Admin Hallway 4
passages.text: \nYou follow the arguing men past some other doorways and into a narrow [[conference room.|Conference Room]]\n

passages.name: Admin Hallway 2
passages.text: \nA broad-shouldered guy in a Sunrise hoodie and stylish ripped jeans comes bounding around the same corner. [["Is this the one?" he says.|Admin Hallway 3]]\n

passages.name: Admin Hallway 3
passages.text: The first guy shakes his head. "I just happened upon him. He's generating some really unusual feedback. I was in the middle of looking for someone else." The second guy scowls. "He'll do," he says. "We've been waiting in the conference room for [[over twenty five minutes."|Admin Hallway 4]]

passages.name: Costume Crook Take
passages.text:
<><><>
\nIt's heavy [[in your hand.|Storage Sublevel]]\n

passages.name: Cafeteria
passages.text:
<>
Cafeteria
This area's cubicles, once part of the Durable Merchandising Dept., have been replaced by plastic furniture, including a [[low counter|Cafeteria Counter]] where the contracted food vendor is handing out [[processed food.|Cafeteria Food]] Sunrise employees line up to claim and quickly scoop down their meal's allotment. <>[[A man with a skinny service dog|Cafeteria Man 1]] sits alone at a plastic table, one of the few available, and a [[double-wide doorway|Bustling Hallway]] leads back to the hall.<>A gaggle of technicians sits at a small grouping of tables, talking shop, and a [[double-wide doorway|Bustling Hallway]] leads back to the hall.<> <><><><>

links.text: A man with a skinny service dog

passages.name: Take Back Shoehorn
passages.text: You pull the shoehorn [[out from under the wheel.|Shopper Back Wheels]]<>

passages.name: Bobber Grab
passages.text: \nIt looks used. [[You put it back.|Fishing Supplies]]

passages.name: Take Bedazzled Shoe Right
passages.text: <>\nYou take the platform sandal, [[a right shoe.|Stock Room Jumble 2 Search]]\n

passages.name: Conference Room Leave
passages.text: You follow him down the hall. This used to be the store's Accounts Pending Dept., but now it's filled with red-shirted technicians tinkering with New Shoes in dimly lit alcoves. Your handler leads you around a corner to a brightly-lit room that looks like a miniature shoe department outfitted with stocked shelves and foot measuring devices, plus a long exam table. [[You hop up on it.|Exam Room Sit]]

passages.name: Mall Entrance Soda Machine
passages.text: \nYou can tell from [[your vantage|Mall Entrance 2]] that the machine sells Jigsaw Cola, a very old brand.

passages.name: Exam Room Door Peer
passages.text: \nAll you see is [[a soft band of light.|Exam Room Locked Door]]\n

passages.name: Stock Room Jumble 2 Search Wait Exit
passages.text: You stand still until the thing has moved around to the right side of the pile and disappeared behind it. [[You exhale.|Stock Room Jumble 2 Search]]

passages.name: Desk Note
passages.text: "... swelling was intermittent throughout the testing period. I attempted to finish the happy clown jigsaw puzzle on the table but again found it way too challenging. A distinct hunger for Swiss cheese and red wine arose at approx. t+30 minutes and was gradually replaced by an even stronger desire to read the poetry of Edgar Allen Poe. Memories that at first seemed fabricated accompanied a feeling of heaviness in my limbs and eyes, and when I sat down, a dream of my past life as a boy thief came over me. I felt guilty, and a putrid sweat then came out of my pores. 'Lawrence Olivea,' I found myself saying, while clapping. 'He is both a challenging actor and a great man.' I really don't know where this stuff is coming from, so if ..." At the bottom of the page, the person has scribbled, "Senses" and added [[four hash marks.|Desk Note 2]]

passages.name: Hair Treatments
passages.text:
<>
Hair Treatments
You browse the wig, gell, hairspray, moose, and pomade displays. On one rack you find a selection of [[lower-priced styling supplies.|Styling Supplies]] There's a low counter nearby and a cash register. Standing behind the register is a [[Sales Associate.|Hair Treatments Associate]] Attached to the counter is a sign that says, “Attention Boosters: We Don't Call Security. WE CALL THE COPS.” You keep one eye on [[the rest of the store.|Hair Treatments Bounce]] <><><><>

passages.name: Empty Office Door Hands Up 2
passages.text: \nReaching backward, your left hand manages to grab ahold of and [[slowly turn the doorhandle.|Admin Hallway]] As you release it, your left foot twinges and burns.\n

passages.name: Sporting Goods
passages.text:
<>
Sporting Goods
You browse the bow and arrow, deer rifle, and taxidermied otter displays. On one rack you find a selection of [[lower-priced fishing supplies.|Fishing Supplies]] There's a low counter nearby and a cash register. Standing behind the register is a [[Sales Associate.|Sporting Goods Associate]] Attached to the counter is a sign that says, “Attention Boosters: We Don't Call Security. WE CALL THE COPS.” You keep one eye on [[the rest of the store.|Sporting Goods Bounce]] <><><><>

passages.name: Bare Room
passages.text:
<>
Bare Room
A small office. The gray pantsuit-wearing woman from the head of the conference table stands next to a large poster advertising the New Shoe. "You can leave, guys," she says, and the guards exit. "Have a seat," she tells you. A lonely [[metal chair|Bare Room Blessed 1]] sits in front of a dusty desk. <><><>

passages.name: Costume Marquis
passages.text: <>The Marquis of the Tomb        Opulent attire swings into view, stitched together from the finest of fabrics and dappled with large plastic silkworms. [[Back|Storage Sublevel Control Box]] <><><><>

passages.name: Comb Grab
passages.text: \nThere's a big crack down the spine. [[You put it back.|Styling Supplies]]\n

passages.name: Bonnets and Brines
passages.text:
<>
Bonnets and Brines
You browse the cornflower and classic blue displays as well as those for salted, vinegar, and pickle. On one shelf you find a selection of [[lower-priced brines.|Brine Supplies]] There's a low counter nearby and a cash register. Standing behind the register is a [[Sales Associate.|Bonnets Associate]] Attached to the counter is a sign that says, “Attention Boosters: We Don't Call Security. WE CALL THE COPS.” You keep one eye on [[the rest of the store.|Bonnets Bounce]] <><><><>

passages.name: Clothing Wandering 1
passages.text: You run from hats to coats to mittens to lingerie to rubber aprons to gargoyles to artificial Christmas trees. Clutching at the controller in your pocket, you crouch down under a display of motorcycle helmets to catch your breath, and you hear panting. It grows closer, and a man with a dog comes jogging around a corner. He's wearing an absurd collection of clothes, multiple jackets, different colors, as if grabbed from the racks at random. "You're lost?" he says and whistles an odd tune, like a signal. [["Yes."|Clothing Wandering Yes]] [[Run.|Clothing Wandering Run]]

passages.name: Cart Completed
passages.text: <><>The door closes behind the cart, and there's a loud clicking sound. "Where would you be without me," Heather tells Vandar and slouches off toward the front counter. "Ask her to show you the basics," he says and hands you your name tag. [["OK."|Stock Room]]

passages.name: Vandar Convo 11
passages.text: <> "Go with him," Vandar says to Heather. "Too bad you were in the bathroom when those vultures came back here." Heather shakes your hand limply. [["Let's go," she says.|Stock Room]]

passages.name: Vandar Convo 10
passages.text: "Good," he says. "Then they haven't gotten far. Now please hurry while I try to rub away this headache. We've got to return those containers and all the others under a binding agreement with the manufacturer, Sunshine ..." "Sunrise," Heather corrects him. Vandar stands up. "Sunrise Developments." [["I can try ..."|Vandar Convo 11]]

passages.name: Beach Sandals 2.1
passages.text: "How old is your wife?" she asks. "A few years younger than I am," he says. The man, wearing an untucked dress shirt, appears to be in his late thirties. "I wanted to do something unexpected," he says and squints at one shoe, then the other. [[Wait.|Beach Sandals 2.2]]

passages.name: Beach Sandals 2.2
passages.text: "And half the time I feel like whatever I do is wrong," the man adds. "The blue one," Heather says decisively, and the guy nods. [["I'll check the stock room," you say.|Beach Sandals 2.3]]

links.text: "I'll check the stock room," you say.

passages.name: Beach Sandals 2.3
passages.text: The man looks up. "She's a size nine," he says. [[You nod.|Beach Sandals Room]]

passages.name: Red Blazer
passages.text: <>   A moldy garment that makes you look like a recently exhumed circus master.    <>   You consider the endless possibilities and reject them all.    <>

passages.name: Hospital
passages.text:
<html><style>#passages{background-color:#000000;margin-left:20%;}</style></html>

<<timedcontinue 4s>>It's not bad here. They put on a movie most every night and give you snacks and Ativan.

<<timedcontinue 5s>>Your parents are a big help. Turns out, they had heard rumors about the New Shoe. Blessed is something of a legend in the defense industry. An urban legend, most hope, but you know better.

<<timedcontinue 8s>>Your folks take the shoes and the controller and make sure they get to Maryann. Everyone agrees you should lie low for a few days.

<<timedcontinue 7s>>Right before you're scheduled to check out, Maryann [[pays you a visit.|Hospital 2]]

passages.name: Training Mission
passages.text: You mimick Heather's movements. She picks up some tissue paper lying on the sales floor, and you pick up some crumpled tape. [["This is easy."|Training Convo 1.1]] [["How long have you worked here?"|Training Convo 2.1]] [["How is Vandar, as a boss?"|Training Convo 3.1]]

passages.name: Inventory
passages.text: [§] <><><><><> <><><><><> <><><><><> <><><><><> <><><> <><><><><> <><><><><> <><><><><> <><><><><> <><><><><> <><><><><> <><><><><> <><><><><> <><><><><> <><><><><> <><><><><> <><><><><> <><><><><> <><><><><> <><><><><>

passages.name: Aisle Escape
passages.text:
<>
\nIt connects, and you sprint down the central aisle. Behind you a guard jumps out of the stock room and trips over Heather's leg, which she extended at just the right time. You dive into the [[Clothing Dept.'s crazy racks,|Clothing Wandering 1]] where there are odd puddles on the floor ringed with algae.\n

passages.name: Makeover Process
passages.text:
<html><style>#passages{background-color:#000000;margin-left:20%;width:700px;}</style></html>
<<timedcontinue 2s>>You get goosebumps.

<<timedcontinue 3s>>It feels like a million tiny lizard feet crawling all over your body.

<<timedcontinue 4s>>They poke and pinch you in places you didn't know you had.

<<timedcontinue 4s>>They poke too hard. Your skin feels ready to tear apart.

<<timedcontinue 3s>>Just when you're about to cry out, everything stops.

<<timedcontinue 3s>>"Finished," the employees say.

<<timedcontinue 2s>>[[You open your eyes.|Clothing Leaving]]

passages.name: Stock Room Jumble 2 Search Wait Exit Grab
passages.text: You miss, and the thing gallops into the shadows behind the pile. [[You curse.|Stock Room Jumble 2 Search]]

passages.name: Upsilon Controller 2
passages.text: <>   You point the disc at your feet and   [[press the yellow button|Use Controller 2]]     <>   You don't know what else to do with it.    <>

passages.name: Name Tag
passages.text: <>   You're wearing it. The script reads, "Michael Cherry."    <>   Probably not the best use of your name tag.    <>

passages.name: Take Controller
passages.text:
<>
\nYour drop the Upsilon Controller [[into your pocket.|Exam Room]]\n

passages.name: Stock Room Boxes
passages.text: \nA large number of women's shoes. You could find a particular size and style [[if you had one in mind.|Stock Room]]\n

links.text: if you had one in mind.

passages.name: Elevator Final
passages.text:
<>
\nYou ride the elevator up and find that the first floor is crawling with Sunrise security. They're searching customers at every exit, going through pockets, bags, everything. You skip past a phalanx of them at the entrance to the mall and navigate for <>[[a department|Sporting Goods]]<><>[[a department|Hair Treatments]]<><>[[a department|Bonnets and Brines]]<> where you might blend in.\n

passages.name: Blessed Office
passages.text:
<>
High-Tech Office
An aquarium burbles next to a mounted captain's wheel and a rusted anchor. Man-sized computer towers flank a curving desk and a double-wide leather chair. Behind the desk is a [[small door,|Blessed Office Small Door]] as if for a dumbwaiter. She pulls out [[the chair for you.|Blessed Office Seated 1]] <><><>

passages.name: Exam Room Door Open
passages.text: \nYou turn the handle, [[and it's locked.|Exam Room Locked Door]]\n

passages.name: Conference Room Speech 1 Pronounce
passages.text:
<>
You clear your throat. "<>" <>[[More words rush into your mind.|Conference Room Speech 2]]<>"Very sorry," your handler says and toggles something on his controller. [["Let's try again."|Conference Room Speech 1]]<>

links.text: More words rush into your mind.

passages.name: Bare Room Blessed 5.1
passages.text: "That's a laugh," she says. "Look at what you're wearing. I can make you do almost anything." [["Who's behind all this?"|Bare Room Blessed 6.1]] [["Are you connected in some way to the government?"|Bare Room Blessed 6.2]]

links.text: "Are you connected in some way to the government?"

passages.name: Bare Room Blessed 5.2
passages.text: "Look at what you're wearing," she says. "I can make you do almost anything." [["Who's behind all this?"|Bare Room Blessed 6.1]] [["Are you connected in some way to the government?"|Bare Room Blessed 6.2]]

links.text: "Are you connected in some way to the government?"

passages.name: Mall Entrance
passages.text:
<>
Mall Entrance
You glance through the opening before heading down the [[elevator to the Lower Level.|Elevator]] Braxton's has long malingered in the most remote sector of the Red River Mall. There's [[little to take note of,|Mall Entrance Nothing]] only a bend that leads to the rest of the mall, a "B AX TON’S" sign, and a [[soda machine.|Mall Entrance Soda Machine]] Also, a bright green, plastic bush. <><><>

passages.name: Clothing Meeting
passages.text: "Sit!" they beckon and try to take off your shoes. You wave them away. A young woman hands you an old chocolate bar, which you take a bite out of and discard. You notice the shopping cart filled with New Shoe containers sitting off to the side. Someone at the edge of the group is talking quietly on a large cell phone. After a minute, he hands it to you. [["Her," he says.|Yipp Final 1]]

passages.name: Front Counter Room
passages.text:
<>
Front Counter
Assorted shoe-related items, including spray deodorizers, fill the front counter's many drawers and cubbies. Out on the sales floor, crooked shoe shelves and trees extend outward until merging with the nearby clothing section, where they disappear. [[An aisle|Shopper Convo 2]] cuts through the near-feral retail area (i.e. the rest of the Lower Level), and a doorway leads to the [[stock room.|Stock Room]] <><><><>Heather is following close behind you.<> <><><>

passages.name: Bare Room Blessed 7.2
passages.text: "Let's take a tour." She escorts you out of the room and even further down the clanking elevator to an airlock of sorts that removes all dust from your clothes. On the other side is a warehouse-sized cavern with an assembly line snaking across the floor and robotic arms that raise and lower at fantastic speeds. Technicians manipulate small tools, and automated lasers rake across the surfaces of shoes held inside translucent boxes. The technicians all look up robot-like and return to their work once the woman waves them on. She leads you into [[an office|Blessed Office]] decorated in a nautical theme.

passages.name: Bare Room Blessed 7.1
passages.text: "We have about five different ways to wipe your memory," she says. [["Oh."|Bare Room Blessed 7.2]]

passages.name: Heather Convo
passages.text: "Don't ask me to explain what just happened," Heather says, "or anything else involving the Lower Level Sales Manager." [["OK."|Front Counter Room]] [["Come on."|Heather Convo 3]] [["Vandar said you would train me."|Heather Convo 2]]

<>
Sales Floor
You hurry out of the break room and onto the main sales floor, which is decorated with sun-colored flourishes and aquamarine patterns. Much of the square footage here is dominated by the enormous Bedding Dept., where yellowing Queen and Crib-sized mattresses cover the floor. Which way to Shoes? Was it right at the chaste-looking four-post beds, skirt the under-priced hutches, and bear straight ahead through lingerie? [[Yes.|9:00 Following First Directions]] [[It's actually left at the desk belonging to a white-capped nurse, right at the dusty highboys and axes, straight past the entrance to the mall, and down a floor on the elevator (where Shoes is positioned on the shores of a retail space verging, due to its seclusion, on the feral).|9:00 Following Second Directions]] <><><>

links.text: It's actually left at the desk belonging to a white-capped nurse, right at the dusty highboys and axes, straight past the entrance to the mall, and down a floor on the elevator (where Shoes is positioned on the shores of a retail space verging, due to its seclusion, on the feral).

passages.name: Take Foot Measurer First
passages.text: \nYou don't have a use for one [[at the moment.|Front Counter Cubby]]\n

passages.name: Empty Office Door 2
passages.text: <>Gray Door        A plain, gray, windowless door. [[Open it.|Empty Office Door Open]] [[Throw up your hands in frustration.|Empty Office Door Hands Up]] [[Back|Empty Office Standing]] <><><>

links.text: Throw up your hands in frustration.

passages.name: Fishing Pliers Grab
passages.text:
<><>
\nYou stick the pliers [[in the pocket|Fishing Supplies]] of your slacks. <>It's beginning to bulge.<><>It's now bulging greatly.<>\n

passages.name: Take Shoehorn
passages.text: <> <>With the woman occupied, you [[slip the shoehorn into your pocket.|Shopper Convo 2]]<>You [[fail at eluding|Shopper Convo 2]] the woman. "I'm going to need that to carry out some heavy-duty prying," she says. <>

links.text: slip the shoehorn into your pocket.

passages.name: Stock Room Open Shoe Box
passages.text: <>Open Shoe Box        The label says all the right things, Style: "Luna," Size: 9D, Color: Tidal. But there is only one right shoe. [[Back|Stock Room Jumble 2 Search]] <><><>

passages.name: Stock Room Closed Door Knock
passages.text: \nYou rap thrice, [[but no one answers.|Stock Room Closed Door]]\n

passages.name: Front Counter Final
passages.text:
<>
Front Counter
The counter is littered with trash. <>It's been ransacked, and a [[large bin|Large Bin]] sits askew.<> A door leads back to the [[stock room,|Bounce Final]] and an [[aisle|Bounce Final]] cuts through the center of the Lower Level. The [[Lower Level Sales Manager|Lower Level Sales Manager]] is chasing you in circles. He wants to reactivate or tune down your shoes. <><><>

passages.text:
